problem_text:
Let N(Z/pZ) be the group defined in Archive, 12.24 (the so-called “Nottingham group”, or the “Wild group”). Find relations of N(Z/pZ) as a pro-p-group (it has two generators, e. g., x + x^2 and x/(1 − x)). Comment of 2009: for p > 2 see progress in (M. V. Ershov, J. London Math. Soc., 71 (2005), 362–378).
I. B. Fesenko
